keyEvents.title: Franky Finds the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Franky locates the Thousand Sunny in the Sea Forest's ship graveyard and meets Den, Tom's younger brother.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the Sea Forest as the location where the Sunny was taken and introduces Den.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Waits for Luffy
keyEvents.description: Jinbe is shown waiting outside Fish-Man Island at the Sea Forest for Luffy to arrive.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the planned meeting between Jinbe and Luffy at this location.

description: The Sea Forest is a unique underwater forest located on Fish-Man Island. It serves as a ship graveyard where debris and wrecked ships are brought in by ocean currents. The forest also contains historical Poneglyphs.
notableFeatures: Ship graveyard where ocean currents deposit debris
culturalSignificance: The Sea Forest is an important historical location on Fish-Man Island, containing Poneglyphs that hold information about the Void Century.

keyEvents.title: Palace Invasion by Hody and Decken
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones and Vander Decken IX successfully breach the palace defenses and invade with their forces.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the battle for Fish-Man Island's future.

keyEvents.title: Palace Flooded by Hody
keyEvents.description: Hody crushes a palace wall, causing the palace to flood with water and endangering the captives.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a life-threatening situation and demonstrates Hody's power and ruthlessness.

keyEvents.title: Neptune Attacked by Yabusame
keyEvents.description: Hody attacks King Neptune and his soldiers with his Yabusame technique while they are bound and defenseless.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the vulnerability of Neptune's forces and Hody's willingness to attack captives.

description: Ryugu Palace is the royal residence of the Neptune royal family on Fish-Man Island. In this episode, it becomes the site of Hody Jones's coup attempt.

statusHistory.description: Invaded and partially flooded by Hody Jones

notableFeatures: Contains connecting corridors and Hard-Shell Tower
Air-filled chambers that can be flooded
